name: Happy Zoo - Wild Animals
description: Create and run your very own ZOO, making it the most delightful and fun place in the world! Collect hundreds of exotic and cute animals, raise adorable unique baby animals, and become the owner of the best ZOO around! Crossbreed your animals and discover new species, provide an amazing experience for your visitors, and enjoy your thrilling new ZOO adventure filled with a variety of mini-games.
